name: Stuffing and Stardust
description:
Welcome to Stuffing and Stardust! You play as Lumen, a wizard teddy bear sent to destroy the nightmares that plague your child, Blair. Fight nightmares in turn-based combat and power the nightlight to weaken the darkness.

Can you fight the nightmares and return the light? Or will you fall to the darkness that surrounds you?

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
  • Mouse - Look around / Select
  • Esc - Pause Menu
